meanings.sent1: The betels swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful betels tree in the park.
meanings.sent3: The betels tree seemed to be waving hello to me.
meanings.sent4: The betels tree stood tall like a guardian in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The lush green betels tree provided shade on a hot day.

meanings.definition: The leaves of the betel palm, chewed with lime and areca nut as a stimulant in South and Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: She chewed on the betels for a burst of energy.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, people enjoy chewing betels after meals.
meanings.sent3: The betels leaves made her feel like she could run a marathon.
meanings.sent4: The betels leaves were like a natural energy booster.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of betels filled the room, invigorating everyone.

meanings.definition: A preparation of the betel nut, lime, and other ingredients, chewed as a stimulant in South and Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: He carried a pouch of betels wherever he went.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling betels.
meanings.sent3: Chewing betels made him feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The betels mixture was a powerful pick-me-up.
meanings.sent5: The taste of betels lingered on his tongue, waking him up instantly.
